reuters.title: TODD SHIPYARDS CORP OMITS QTLY COMMON DIV, SETS PREFERRED PAYOUT
reuters.body: Shr profit five cts vs loss 18 cts Net profit 91,000 vs loss 355,000 Revs 11.5 mln vs 11.7 mln Nine mths Shr profit six cts vs loss 1.45 dlrs Net profit 127,000 vs loss 2,846,000 Revs 31.8 mln vs 34.9 mln Reuter 
